forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 17 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 15 to 28 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock gently ticks into the early hours of Tuesday morning, Downtown San Francisco finds itself nestled under a cloak of patchy drizzle and clouds that weave like soft whispers across the sky. With the temperature hovering near a cool 54, the atmosphere carries a refreshing briskness, punctuated by a west-southwest wind that rustles through trees, beckoning a lively day ahead. As dawn approaches, the promise of clearing skies glimmers faintly, the city poised to shake off its nocturnal coat.

Throughout the day, a transformation unfolds. The forecast suggests a turn towards sunnier vistas as the morning drizzle subsides before 8 AM, yielding to a mostly sunny embrace, with highs reaching near 62. In the afternoon, temperatures will subtly dip, creating a pleasant chill that stirs you to move about in your lightest layers—a cozy sweater or a light jacket will harmonize with the gentle gusts that may tease at your collar. The city, with its iconic landmarks and vibrant streets, welcomes a spectrum of activities today, whether it be a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to one of the city’s hidden coffee nooks, inviting you to savor a leisurely cup while watching life dance past. Enjoy the day, letting the gentle wind tousle your thoughts as you explore the dynamic rhythms of this cherished urban tapestry.
